label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"鸡白冠病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":6,"end":14,"text":"鸡住白细胞原虫病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":17,"end":23,"text":"住白细胞原虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":26,"end":29,"text":"红细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"单核细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":48,"end":52,"text":"寄生虫病","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"贫血","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 鸡白冠病又称鸡住白细胞原虫病,是由住白细胞原虫寄生于红细胞和单核细胞引起的一种以贫血为主要特征的寄生虫病。

label: [{"start":3,"end":11,"text":"卡氏住白细胞原虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":12,"end":20,"text":"沙氏住白细胞原虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":25,"end":33,"text":"卡氏住白细胞原虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":43,"end":49,"text":"雏鸡大批死亡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":50,"end":56,"text":"中鸡发育受阻","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":57,"end":61,"text":"成鸡贫血","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":59,"end":61,"text":"贫血","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":52,"end":56,"text":"发育受阻","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":43,"end":45,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":50,"end":52,"text":"中鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":57,"end":59,"text":"成鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 主要由卡氏住白细胞原虫和沙氏住白细胞原虫引起,尤以卡氏住白细胞原虫危害最为严重,可引起雏鸡大批死亡,中鸡发育受阻,成鸡贫血。该病在我国南方地区多发于4~10月,北方地区多发于7~9月。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"鸡白冠病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":5,"end":12,"text":"鸡住白细胞原虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":15,"end":16,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":17,"end":20,"text":"白细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":21,"end":24,"text":"红细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":30,"end":35,"text":"血孢子虫病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":36,"end":43,"text":"鸡住白细胞原虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":50,"end":58,"text":"卡氏住白细胞原虫","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 鸡白冠病是鸡住白细胞原虫寄生于鸡的白细胞和红细胞内引起的一种血孢子虫病；鸡住白细胞原虫有多种，其中以卡氏住白细胞原虫最常见，且危害最严重。

label: [{"start":14,"end":15,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":17,"end":30,"text":"肌肉组织和内脏器官广泛出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":21,"text":"肌肉组织","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":22,"end":26,"text":"内脏器官","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":34,"end":40,"text":"鸡冠失血苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":51,"end":54,"text":"蚊子病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"鸡冠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"失血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":40,"text":"苍白","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 一般以夏秋季多发生，受感染的鸡只以肌肉组织和内脏器官广泛出血为特征，鸡冠失血苍白而得名，有些地方也称为蚊子病。

label: [{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":8,"end":12,"text":"尸体消瘦","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":13,"end":19,"text":"血液变得稀薄","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"稀淡","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":43,"text":"腿肌有明显的芝麻状大小出血点或雪斑","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":44,"end":48,"text":"肌肉苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":46,"end":48,"text":"苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"稀薄","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":40,"text":"出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":41,"end":43,"text":"雪斑","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":49,"end":55,"text":"肝脾肿大脆弱","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":51,"end":53,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":53,"end":55,"text":"脆弱","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":56,"end":59,"text":"出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":60,"end":64,"text":"白点结节","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"血液","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"胸肌","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"腿肌","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":49,"end":51,"text":"肝脾","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病变剖检病鸡可见尸体消瘦，血液变得稀薄、稀淡，胸肌、腿肌有明显的芝麻状大小出血点或雪斑，肌肉苍白，肝脾肿大脆弱以出血点或白点结节为特征。

label: [{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"体温升高","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"食欲不振","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":24,"end":28,"text":"精神沉郁","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"流涎","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":32,"end":42,"text":"排黄白色或黄绿色稀粪","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":37,"end":40,"text":"黄绿色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":33,"end":36,"text":"黄白色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":43,"end":49,"text":"生长发育受阻","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":50,"end":54,"text":"羽毛松乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":58,"end":62,"text":"呼吸困难","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":63,"end":65,"text":"咯血","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":71,"end":76,"text":"产蛋率下降","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":52,"end":54,"text":"松乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":67,"end":69,"text":"蛋鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":41,"end":42,"text":"粪","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":50,"end":52,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":64,"end":65,"text":"血","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 发生本病的雏鸡症状明显，病鸡体温升高，食欲不振，精神沉郁，流涎，排黄白色或黄绿色稀粪，生长发育受阻，羽毛松乱，行走、呼吸困难，咯血等。蛋鸡一般产蛋率下降10%左右。

label: [{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"贫血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":21,"text":"鸡冠苍白无血色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":21,"text":"无血色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"尸体消瘦","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":33,"end":37,"text":"血液稀薄","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"稀薄","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":38,"end":44,"text":"全身肌肉苍白","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":42,"end":44,"text":"苍白","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":47,"end":50,"text":"脾肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":48,"end":50,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":51,"end":57,"text":"表面有出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":57,"end":69,"text":"，肝上有粟粒大的白色结节","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":65,"end":67,"text":"白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"鸡冠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"血液","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":45,"end":46,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":47,"end":48,"text":"脾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":58,"end":59,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 所有病鸡最明显的特征是贫血，鸡冠苍白无血色。剖检病鸡可见尸体消瘦，血液稀薄，全身肌肉苍白。肝、脾肿大，表面有出血点，肝上有粟粒大的白色结节。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"消化道充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":6,"end":11,"text":"腹腔有血水","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"肾脏出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":33,"text":"腿肌与胸肌上有针尖大小的点状出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":33,"text":"点状出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"消化道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"腹腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"肾脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"腿肌","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"胸肌","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 消化道充血，腹腔有血水。肾脏出血，腿肌与胸肌上有针尖大小的点状出血。

label: [{"start":55,"end":56,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":66,"end":68,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":69,"end":71,"text":"死鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":75,"end":76,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":78,"end":82,"text":"咯出血痰","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":83,"end":89,"text":"死后口角流血","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":85,"end":87,"text":"口角","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 根据发病季节、临诊症状及剖检变化可以作出初步诊断，结合采血涂片镜检看到虫体可以确诊。发病急，平时稍不注意，在喂鸡时发现墙角落处倦缩的病鸡或死鸡，严重的鸡只会咯出血痰或死后口角流血。发病天龄多在15-35天左右。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"病死鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":3,"end":7,"text":"血液稀薄","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"稀薄","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":8,"end":12,"text":"不易凝固","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":13,"end":19,"text":"肌肉色泽苍白","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"苍白","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":48,"end":60,"text":"有许多粟粒大的出血小结节","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":61,"end":68,"text":"肝脏及脾脏肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":66,"end":68,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":69,"end":71,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":72,"end":81,"text":"表面有灰白色坏死点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":75,"end":78,"text":"灰白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"血液","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":20,"end":21,"text":"胸","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":22,"end":25,"text":"腿肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"胰脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":29,"end":33,"text":"肠管表面","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":34,"end":35,"text":"心","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":36,"end":37,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":38,"end":39,"text":"脾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":42,"end":48,"text":"腹部皮下脂肪","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":61,"end":63,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":64,"end":66,"text":"脾脏","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病死鸡血液稀薄、不易凝固,肌肉色泽苍白,胸、腿肌肉,胰脏、肠管表面,心、肝、脾表面及腹部皮下脂肪有许多粟粒大的出血小结节,肝脏及脾脏肿大、出血,表面有灰白色坏死点。

label: [{"start":6,"end":12,"text":"嗉囊内有血液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":19,"text":"肾肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":31,"text":"表面有大量血凝块","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":35,"text":"肺出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":47,"text":"气管和支气管内有血凝块","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":44,"end":47,"text":"血凝块","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":52,"end":56,"text":"卵巢破裂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":54,"end":56,"text":"破裂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":59,"end":65,"text":"卵黄性腹膜炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"腹腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"气管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"嗉囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"血液","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"黏液","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":16,"end":17,"text":"肾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":32,"end":33,"text":"肺","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"气管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":39,"end":42,"text":"支气管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":52,"end":54,"text":"卵巢","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":48,"end":52,"text":"病死母鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 腹腔、气管、嗉囊内有血液、黏液。肾肿胀、出血,表面有大量血凝块。肺出血,气管和支气管内有血凝块。病死母鸡卵巢破裂,形成卵黄性腹膜炎。

label: [{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":43,"end":50,"text":"卡氏白细胞原虫","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 根据病鸡的症状特征很容易作出诊断，必要时可以取得血涂片，经瑞氏染色后于高倍显微镜下观察卡氏白细胞原虫的配子体。

label: [{"start":8,"end":11,"text":"泰天净","labels":["drug"]},{"start":12,"end":15,"text":"敌菌净","labels":["drug"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"混合拌料","labels":["control"]},{"start":22,"end":25,"text":"泰灭净","labels":["drug"]},{"start":32,"end":35,"text":"泰灭净","labels":["drug"]},{"start":55,"end":59,"text":"敌敌菌净","labels":["drug"]},{"start":75,"end":80,"text":"维生素K3","labels":["drug"]},{"start":81,"end":84,"text":"安络血","labels":["drug"]},{"start":100,"end":103,"text":"克球粉","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 在治疗上，可以用泰天净、敌菌净混合拌料，如果泰灭净是水溶剂可以将泰灭净25-30克兑水50公斤饮用，同时拌料用敌敌菌净100克拌料50公斤，并适当添加维生素K3或安络血；另外，如果病情较重时，另一餐用克球粉50克开料40公斤，连用3-5日。

label: [{"start":4,"end":7,"text":"百服安","labels":["drug"]},{"start":36,"end":39,"text":"病鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":50,"end":52,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":65,"end":72,"text":"有抗原虫的药物","labels":["drug"]},{"start":61,"end":64,"text":"克球粉","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 或者使用百服安（含SD、SMZ、SMM、TMP）进行治疗。经过上述处理，病鸡群均能很快地控制病情。当鸡群好转后还要再用三天克球粉等有抗原虫的药物做巩固效果。

label: [{"start":10,"end":16,"text":"扑灭传播媒介","labels":["control"]},{"start":48,"end":53,"text":"敌百虫溶液","labels":["drug"]},{"start":60,"end":65,"text":"蝇毒磷溶液","labels":["drug"]},{"start":34,"end":39,"text":"喷洒杀虫药","labels":["control"]},{"start":36,"end":39,"text":"杀虫药","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 预防本病的主要措施是扑灭传播媒介--库蠓。在流行季节对鸡舍内外每周应喷洒杀虫药，如用0.01%的敌百虫溶液或0.03%的蝇毒磷溶液等。

label: [{"start":8,"end":21,"text":"在鸡饲料中添加药物进行预防","labels":["control"]},{"start":9,"end":10,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":23,"end":26,"text":"可爱丹","labels":["drug"]},{"start":27,"end":30,"text":"泰灭净","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 在本病流行季节，在鸡饲料中添加药物进行预防，如可爱丹、泰灭净等。

label: [{"start":9,"end":12,"text":"泰灭净","labels":["drug"]},{"start":40,"end":44,"text":"磺胺嘧啶","labels":["drug"]},{"start":45,"end":46,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 发生本病时治疗首选泰灭净，原粉用量为1克拌料2.5公斤，连喂5-7天。也可用增效磺胺嘧啶，鸡每公斤体重口服25毫克，首次量可以加倍，连服3-4天。

label: [{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"氯喹","labels":["drug"]},{"start":6,"end":7,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":42,"end":46,"text":"交替用药","labels":["control"]}]
text: 还可用氯喹，鸡每公斤体重口服100毫克，每天服1次，连服3天，隔2天再服用3天。注意交替用药。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"磺胺药","labels":["drug"]},{"start":4,"end":9,"text":"住白细胞虫","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 磺胺药对住白细胞虫的杀灭效果较好。

label: [{"start":6,"end":9,"text":"磺胺药","labels":["drug"]},{"start":10,"end":19,"text":"磺胺-6-甲氧嘧啶","labels":["drug"]},{"start":20,"end":29,"text":"磺胺-2-甲氧嘧啶","labels":["drug"]},{"start":30,"end":36,"text":"磺胺氯吡嗪钠","labels":["drug"]},{"start":37,"end":42,"text":"磺胺喹噁啉","labels":["drug"]},{"start":43,"end":50,"text":"磺胺甲基异噁唑","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 临床常用的有磺胺药如磺胺-6-甲氧嘧啶、磺胺-2-甲氧嘧啶、磺胺氯吡嗪钠、磺胺喹噁啉、磺胺甲基异噁唑等。

label: [{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"拌料","labels":["control"]},{"start":13,"end":19,"text":"饮水大群给药","labels":["control"]},{"start":27,"end":30,"text":"磺胺药","labels":["drug"]},{"start":31,"end":32,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"肾脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":56,"end":57,"text":"肾","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 使用时可根据用量选择拌料或饮水大群给药,值得一提的是,磺胺药对鸡的肾脏有较强的毒副作用,使用时最好不要复配其他对肾有毒性的药物。

label: [{"start":1,"end":6,"text":"氨基糖胺类","labels":["drug"]},{"start":7,"end":11,"text":"非甾体类","labels":["drug"]},{"start":27,"end":30,"text":"小苏打","labels":["drug"]},{"start":39,"end":42,"text":"磺胺药","labels":["drug"]},{"start":43,"end":46,"text":"输尿管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":59,"end":61,"text":"肾脏","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 如氨基糖胺类、非甾体类等药物,且在用药期间同时配合使用小苏打,以便碱化尿液防止磺胺药在输尿管中沉积形成结晶尿,从而造成肾脏的损伤。

label: [{"start":2,"end":5,"text":"杀虫药","labels":["drug"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":11,"end":15,"text":"严重贫血","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":16,"end":20,"text":"机体衰弱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":25,"end":36,"text":"配合使用补血保健类药物","labels":["control"]},{"start":29,"end":36,"text":"补血保健类药物","labels":["drug"]},{"start":37,"end":49,"text":"饮水中可添加VC可溶性粉","labels":["control"]},{"start":53,"end":55,"text":"血管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":43,"end":49,"text":"VC可溶性粉","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 除了杀虫药外,由于病鸡严重贫血,机体衰弱,需要及时配合使用补血保健类药物,饮水中可添加VC可溶性粉,以增强血管的致密性,防止出血加重。

label: [{"start":0,"end":19,"text":"及时在料中拌入电解多维和微量元素预混剂","labels":["control"]},{"start":7,"end":11,"text":"电解多维","labels":["drug"]},{"start":12,"end":19,"text":"微量元素预混剂","labels":["drug"]},{"start":22,"end":26,"text":"VB12","labels":["drug"]},{"start":27,"end":28,"text":"铁","labels":["drug"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"骨髓","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":37,"end":42,"text":"造血干细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":54,"end":59,"text":"外周血细胞","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 及时在料中拌入电解多维和微量元素预混剂,其中VB12和铁元素都有助于骨髓中造血干细胞的分裂和分化,可及时补充外周血细胞,加速机体恢复。

label: [{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":57,"end":61,"text":"内脏器官","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":83,"end":86,"text":"蛋鸡难","labels":["type"]},{"start":95,"end":97,"text":"肉鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 对于严重感染且治疗希望渺茫的鸡群,建议直接淘汰,因即使能收到好的治疗效果,鸡群后期的生产性能也难以完全恢复,特别是内脏器官出现器质性损伤后,机体的代谢会受到很大影响,蛋鸡难以达到产蛋高峰期,肉鸡料肉比升高,失去治疗价值。
